text: Xudovand sumoro ʙa saʙaʙi savgandhoi ʙehudaaton ʙozxost naxohad kard. Vale ʙa saʙaʙi sikastani savgandhoe, ki ʙa qasd mexured, ʙozxost mekunad va carimai on ta'omi dah miskin ast az ƣizoi mijokae, ki ʙa xonavodai xes mexuroned jo pupisi onho, jo ozod kardani jak ʙanda va har ki najoʙad, se ruz ruza dostan. In kaforai qasam ast, har goh, ki qasam xurded. Ba qasamhoi xud vafo kuned. Xudo ojoti xudro ʙaroi sumo incunin ʙajon mekunad, ʙosad, ki sukrguzor ʙosed
